column4: Hi.  For some reason after this last update, no sound comes out of my computer: only a crackle.
But when I open sound preferences and test the sound using OSS, I get the test beep.
double click the sound icon and put the PCM all the way up
do you have HDA Intel (Alsa Mixer) on the sound devices or something like that
But OSS is the only one that gets a beep when I test it in sound preferences.
ok one more thing type alsamixer -Dhw
check if those are all up
